name: God of Iaido
description: Become a samurai and defeat powerful enemies using your adept “iaido” techniques! The God if Iaido is a 2D action game, in which your character will stay in the middle of the field and resist threats from the enemies coming from both sides of the battle field. As a master of iaido, instead of positively attacking, you should stay calm and always wait to parry the enemies’ attacks with fast iaido. The game is currently a short demo, and we hope you enjoy it!
